name: Dodgy Rocks
description:
I thought I'd see what the community has to say about my latest lil weekend project. It's really nothing spectacular, just an endless runner that increases with difficulty as you go, with some pickups and boosts.

The game is currently in open beta on the Playstore.

Here are some screenshots from the current state:

There are still little bugs here and there, and I plan on adding some more power ups to make it more interesting, and possibly also redoing some of the sprites as I seem to have been a lil inconsistent with the pixel densities.

Here are some screenshots of the Leaderboard feature set I recently added:

Any and all feedback is appreciated :D
